## –û—Ç–∫–∞–∑ –æ—Ç –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏

–ù–∞—Å—Ç–æ—è—â–∏–π –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑ –æ—Ç –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ä–µ–≥—É–ª–∏—Ä—É–µ—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–∞. –í–∞—à–µ —á—Ç–µ–Ω–∏–µ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω–æ–π —á–∞—Å—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–∞, –≤ –¥–æ–ø–æ–ª–Ω–µ–Ω–∏–µ –∫ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º—É –æ—Ç–∫–∞–∑—É –æ—Ç –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –æ–∑–Ω–∞—á–∞–µ—Ç –≤–∞—à–µ —Å–æ–≥–ª–∞—Å–∏–µ —Å –µ–≥–æ —É—Å–ª–æ–≤–∏—è–º–∏ –≤ –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ–º –æ–±—ä–µ–º–µ.

–•–æ—Ç—è —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–ª –≤—Å–µ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ–µ –¥–ª—è –æ–±–µ—Å–ø–µ—á–µ–Ω–∏—è —Ç–æ—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏ –¥–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–µ, –≤—Å—è –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è ¬´–∫–∞–∫ –µ—Å—Ç—å¬ª.

–≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç –Ω–µ –¥–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–∏–∫–∞–∫–∏—Ö –≥–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∏–π, –æ–±–µ—â–∞–Ω–∏–π –∏/–∏–ª–∏ –∑–∞—è–≤–ª–µ–Ω–∏–π –ª—é–±–æ–≥–æ —Ä–æ–¥–∞, –≤—ã—Ä–∞–∂–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –∏–ª–∏ –ø–æ–¥—Ä–∞–∑—É–º–µ–≤–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö, –≤ –æ—Ç–Ω–æ—à–µ–Ω–∏–∏ —Ç–æ—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏—è, –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Ç—ã, –æ–±–æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, —Å–≤–æ–µ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, –¥–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ (–∏–ª–∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–≥–æ) –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–π –≤ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω–æ–º –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–µ, –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω—ã—Ö —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–æ–≤, –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ—Ç –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è) —ç—Ç–æ–π –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –µ–µ –ø—Ä–∏–≥–æ–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ (–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–µ–ø—Ä–∏–≥–æ–¥–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏) –¥–ª—è –≤–∞—à–∏—Ö –∫–æ–Ω–∫—Ä–µ—Ç–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–±—Å—Ç–æ—è—Ç–µ–ª—å—Å—Ç–≤.

–≠–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç –Ω–µ –Ω–µ—Å–µ—Ç –Ω–∏–∫–∞–∫–æ–π –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∑–∞ —Ç–æ—á–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏–µ, –ø–æ–ª–Ω–æ—Ç—É, –æ–±–æ—Å–Ω–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, —Å–≤–æ–µ–≤—Ä–µ–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å, –¥–æ—Å—Ç–æ–≤–µ—Ä–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å (–∏–ª–∏ –æ–±—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω–æ–µ) –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏, —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞—â–µ–π—Å—è –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–µ, –ª—é–±—ã–µ –æ—à–∏–±–∫–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —É–ø—É—â–µ–Ω–∏—è, –ø–æ—Ç–µ—Ä–∏ –∏–ª–∏ —É—â–µ—Ä–± –ª—é–±–æ–π –ø—Ä–∏—Ä–æ–¥—ã (–ø—Ä—è–º–æ–π, –∫–æ—Å–≤–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–π, –≤—ã—Ç–µ–∫–∞—é—â–∏–π –∏–ª–∏ –∏–Ω–æ–π) –Ω–µ–∑–∞–≤–∏—Å–∏–º–æ –æ—Ç —Ç–æ–≥–æ, –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∏–∫–∞—é—Ç –ª–∏ –æ–Ω–∏ –≤ –¥–æ–≥–æ–≤–æ—Ä–µ, –¥–µ–ª–∏–∫—Ç–µ –∏–ª–∏ –∏–Ω—ã–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–º, –∏–ª–∏ –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–µ –º–æ–≥—É—Ç –≤–æ–∑–Ω–∏–∫–Ω—É—Ç—å –≤ —Ä–µ–∑—É–ª—å—Ç–∞—Ç–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è (–∏–ª–∏ –Ω–µ –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏—è) –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ —ç—Ç–æ–º –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–µ, –¥–∞–∂–µ –µ—Å–ª–∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç –±—ã–ª –ø—Ä–æ–∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∏—Ä–æ–≤–∞–Ω –æ –≤–æ–∑–º–æ–∂–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ —Ç–∞–∫–æ–≥–æ —É—â–µ—Ä–±–∞.

–í –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–µ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞—Ç—Å—è —Å—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏–µ —Å–∞–π—Ç—ã, –ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∞–¥–ª–µ–∂–∞—â–∏–µ —Ç—Ä–µ—Ç—å–∏–º —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–∞–º. –°–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏–µ —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö —Å–∞–π—Ç–æ–≤ –Ω–µ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è –ø–æ–¥ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç—Ä–æ–ª–µ–º —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–∞, –∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç –Ω–µ –Ω–µ—Å–µ—Ç –æ—Ç–≤–µ—Ç—Å—Ç–≤–µ–Ω–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏ –∑–∞ –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏—é –∏–ª–∏ —Å–æ–¥–µ—Ä–∂–∞–Ω–∏–µ —ç—Ç–∏—Ö —Å–∞–π—Ç–æ–≤. –°—Å—ã–ª–∫–∏ –Ω–∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∏–µ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∏–µ —Å–∞–π—Ç—ã –Ω–µ –¥–æ–ª–∂–Ω—ã –≤–æ—Å–ø—Ä–∏–Ω–∏–º–∞—Ç—å—Å—è –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ —Ä–µ–∫–æ–º–µ–Ω–¥–∞—Ü–∏–∏ —ç–∫—Å–ø–µ—Ä—Ç–æ–º —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–µ–≥–æ —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞ –∏–ª–∏ –ª—é–±—ã—Ö –ø—Ä–æ–¥—É–∫—Ç–æ–≤, —Ä–µ–∫–ª–∞–º–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã—Ö, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–ª–∞–≥–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö –∏–ª–∏ –ø—Ä–æ–¥–∞–≤–∞–µ–º—ã—Ö –Ω–∞ —Å—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–Ω–Ω–∏—Ö —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞—Ö, –∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∂–µ –≤ –∫–∞—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–µ –≥–∞—Ä–∞–Ω—Ç–∏–∏ —Ç–æ–≥–æ, —á—Ç–æ –Ω–∞ —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö —Å–∞–π—Ç–∞—Ö –Ω–µ—Ç –∫–æ–º–ø—å—é—Ç–µ—Ä–Ω—ã—Ö –≤–∏—Ä—É—Å–æ–≤ –∏–ª–∏ –ª—é–±—ã—Ö –¥—Ä—É–≥–∏—Ö —ç–ª–µ–º–µ–Ω—Ç–æ–≤ –¥–µ—Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Å–≤–æ–π—Å—Ç–≤–∞.

## –ü–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö

–í–µ—Å—å –ø—Ä–æ—Ü–µ—Å—Å –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è –∏ –æ—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫–∏ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –Ω–µ —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –Ω–∏ –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º (–¥–∞–∂–µ –±–ª–∏–∑–∫–æ), –Ω–∏ –ª–µ–≥–∫–æ –≤–æ—Å–ø—Ä–æ–∏–∑–≤–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–º –≤ –µ–≥–æ —Ç–µ–∫—É—â–µ–º —Å–æ—Å—Ç–æ—è–Ω–∏–∏. –†–∞–∑—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞ –º–µ—Ç–æ–¥–∞ –ø–æ–ª—É—á–µ–Ω–∏—è / –æ—á–∏—Å—Ç–∫–∏ —Ç–∞–∫–∏—Ö –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö –æ–ø—Ç–∏–º–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –æ–±—Ä–∞–∑–æ–º —Å—Ç–∞–ª–∞ –æ—Ç–¥–µ–ª—å–Ω—ã–º –ø—Ä–æ–µ–∫—Ç–æ–º. –ï—Å–ª–∏ –≤–∞—Å –∏–Ω—Ç–µ—Ä–µ—Å—É–µ—Ç —ç—Ç–∞ —Ç–µ–º–∞, –ø–æ–∂–∞–ª—É–π—Å—Ç–∞, —Å–≤—è–∂–∏—Ç–µ—Å—å —Å–æ –º–Ω–æ–π, –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑—É—è –ª—é–±—ã–µ —Å–æ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ –∫–æ–Ω—Ç–∞–∫—Ç—ã, –ø—Ä–µ–¥–æ—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤ –∫–æ–Ω—Ü–µ –æ—Ç—á–µ—Ç–∞.

## –ü—Ä–µ–¥-–æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∞

–î–ª—è –ø—Ä–µ–¥–≤–∞—Ä–∏—Ç–µ–ª—å–Ω–æ–π –æ–±—Ä–∞–±–æ—Ç–∫–∏ –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞ —è –Ω–∞–ø–∏—Å–∞–ª —Å–ø–µ—Ü–∏–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–π –ø–∞—Ä—Å–µ—Ä. –ó–Ω–∞—è —Å—Ç—Ä—É–∫—Ç—É—Ä—É –ø–æ–¥–≥–æ—Ç–æ–≤–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–≥–æ —Ñ–∞–π–ª–∞, –º—ã –º–æ–∂–µ–º –ø—Ä–æ–π—Ç–∏ —á–µ—Ä–µ–∑ –Ω–µ–≥–æ –ø–æ—Å—Ç—Ä–æ—á–Ω–æ, —Å–æ—Ö—Ä–∞–Ω—è—è –Ω–µ–æ–±—Ö–æ–¥–∏–º—ã–µ —Ñ—Ä–∞–≥–º–µ–Ω—Ç—ã –∏–Ω—Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ü–∏–∏ –≤ —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—É.

```{r parser}
# Information parser for pre-processed file
# (c) 2017 Denis Rasulev
# All Rights Reserved

parse_comments <- function(comments) {
     # this function goes through pre-processed comments file row by row,
     # finds information by certain markers and saves it to data frame as
     # name, text of comment, number of likes and date posted
     # returns data.frame['name','cmnt','like','year',''month','day','hour']

     # load required libraries
     library(lubridate)  # Make Dealing with Dates a Little Easier

     # save length of file with comments
     number_of_rows <- length(comments)

     # prepare empty data frame to store name, comment, likes and dates
     df <- data.frame(matrix(ncol = 4, nrow = number_of_rows))
     colnames(df) <- c('name','cmnt','like','date')

     for (i in 1:number_of_rows ) {

          # if row is empty...
          if ( comments[i] == "" ) {

               # then next row contains commenter's name
               df[i, 'name'] <- comments[i + 1]

               # third row after empty one contains text of a comment and
               # it always starts with the name of a commenter so we remove it
               comment_text <- sub(paste0(comments[i + 1],' '), '', comments[i + 2])

               # text of a comment may be on several lines so we need index
               # to read them all
               j <- 3

               # while next line doesn't start with middle dot '¬∑' (unicode 00B7)
               while (substring(comments[i + j], 1, 1) != '\U00B7') {

                    # check if we have reached end of the file where we need to
                    # break the loop
                    if ( i + j > number_of_rows ) {
                         break
                    }

                    # if not end then add every line to comment
                    comment_text <- paste(comment_text, comments[i + j])
                    j <- j + 1
               }

               # save complete text of a comment
               df[i, 'cmnt'] <- comment_text

               # save number of likes for a comment, removing midle dot
               df[i, 'like'] <- sub('\U00B7 ', '', comments[i + j])

               # save date when a comment was posted, removing midle dot
               df[i, 'date'] <- sub('\U00B7 ', '', comments[i + j + 1])
          }
     }

     # remove empty rows, consisting only of NAs
     df <- na.omit(df)

     # convert number of likes from character to number
     df[,'like'] <- as.numeric(df[,'like'])

     # split date column for convenience of further analysis
     df[,'dt']    <- parse_date_time(df[,'date'], orders = "mdy IMp")
     df[,'year']  <- year(df[,'dt'])
     df[,'month'] <- month(df[,'dt'])
     df[,'day']   <- day(df[,'dt'])
     df[,'hour']  <- hour(df[,'dt'])

     # remove unused columns
     df[,c('date','dt')] <- NULL

     # return clean data frame
     return(df)
}

```

–ê–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑ –∑–∞–Ω–∏–º–∞–µ—Ç –Ω–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–µ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è –∏ –≤–æ–∑–≤—Ä–∞—â–∞–µ—Ç —á–∏—Å—Ç—ã–µ –∏ –∞–∫–∫—É—Ä–∞—Ç–Ω—ã–µ –¥–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–µ –≤ —Ñ–æ—Ä–º–∞—Ç–µ —Ç–∞–±–ª–∏—Ü—ã (data frame).

## –ù–∞—Å—Ç—Ä–æ–π–∫–∞ –∏ –∑–∞–≥—Ä—É–∑–∫–∞

```{r load_data, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# Facebook Comments Exploration and Analysis
# (c) 2017 Denis Rasulev
# All Rights Reserved

# set working directory
setwd('/Volumes/data/projects/fb_sentiment/')

# load required libraries and functions
library(tm)         # Framework for text mining applications within R
library(NLP)        # Basic classes and methods for Natural Language Processing
library(ggplot2)    # Implementation of the grammar of graphics in R
library(wordcloud2) # Fast visualization tool for creating wordcloud
source("parser.r")
source("helper.r")

# if parsed file does not exist
if (!file.exists("data/comments.rds")) {

     # then load pre-processed comments file
     comments_file  <- readLines("data/comments_processed.txt",
                                 encoding = "UTF-8", skipNul = FALSE, warn = FALSE)

     # parse everything from it
     parsed <- parse_comments(comments_file)

     # and save it to disk
     saveRDS(parsed, file = "data/comments.rds")

     # clear memory
     rm(comments_file, parse_comments, parsed)
}

# if parsed file already exists, read it in
df_comments <- readRDS("data/comments.rds")
```

–ê–±—Å–æ–ª—é—Ç–Ω—ã–º –ª–∏–¥–µ—Ä–æ–º —è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è **`r v$name[1]`**, —á–µ–π –∫–æ–º–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–π –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–ª `r v$like[1]` –ª–∞–π–∫–æ–≤. –ù–∞ –≤—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–º –º–µ—Å—Ç–µ –Ω–∞—Ö–æ–¥–∏—Ç—Å—è –∫–æ–º–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–π **`r v$name[2]`** —Å `r v$like[2]` –ª–∞–π–∫–∞–º–∏. –ù–∞ —Ç—Ä–µ—Ç—å–µ–º –º–µ—Å—Ç–µ –∫–æ–º–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–π **`r v$name[3]`** —Å `r v$like[3]` –ª–∞–π–∫–∞–º–∏.

–ö–æ–º–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–π `r v$name[1]`, –Ω–∞–±—Ä–∞–≤—à–∏–π –Ω–∞–∏–±–æ–ª—å—à–µ–µ –∫–æ–ª–∏—á–µ—Å—Ç–≤–æ –ª–∞–π–∫–æ–≤, –ø—Ä–µ–¥—Å—Ç–∞–≤–ª—è–ª —Å–æ–±–æ–π —Ñ—Ä–∞–∑—É "–∏ —Ç—É—Ç –ø–æ—è–≤–ª—è–µ—Ç—Å—è –æ–Ω..." –∏ —Ñ–æ—Ç–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏—é "–£—è—Ç–º–µ–Ω–∞". –ü–æ—è—Å–Ω–µ–Ω–∏—è —Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏—Ç–µ –¥–∞–ª–µ–µ.

–ù–µ–∑–∞–¥–æ–ª–≥–æ –¥–æ —Ç–æ–≥–æ, –∫–∞–∫ –±—ã–ª —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞–Ω –∞–Ω–∞–ª–∏–∑–∏—Ä—É–µ–º—ã–π –ø–æ—Å—Ç, –≤ –∫–∞–∑–∞—Ö—Å—Ç–∞–Ω—Å–∫–æ–º —Å–µ–≥–º–µ–Ω—Ç–µ Facebook –±—ã–ª –µ—â–µ –æ–¥–∏–Ω –≤—Å–ø–ª–µ—Å–∫ –∞–∫—Ç–∏–≤–Ω–æ—Å—Ç–∏, —Å–≤—è–∑–∞–Ω–Ω—ã–π —Å —á–µ–ª–æ–≤–µ–∫–æ–º, –∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä—ã–π –Ω–∞–∫—Ä—ã–ª —Ç–∫–∞–Ω—å—é —Å—Ç–∞—Ç—É—é –¥–µ–≤—É—à–∫–∏ —Å –∑–∞–º–µ—Ç–Ω—ã–º–∏ –∞–Ω–∞—Ç–æ–º–∏—á–µ—Å–∫–∏–º–∏ –¥–µ—Ç–∞–ª—è–º–∏, –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º—É —á—Ç–æ, –ø–æ –µ–≥–æ —Å–ª–æ–≤–∞–º, —ç—Ç–æ –±—ã–ª ¬´—É—è—Ç¬ª (—Å—Ç—ã–¥, –ø–æ–∑–æ—Ä). –ü–æ—Å–ª–µ —ç—Ç–æ–≥–æ –æ–Ω –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–ª –∏–∑–≤–µ—Å—Ç–Ω–æ—Å—Ç—å –∏ –ø—Ä–æ–∑–≤–∏—â–µ ¬´–£—è—Ç–º—ç–Ω¬ª. –≠—Ç–æ –≤ –Ω–µ–∫–æ—Ç–æ—Ä–æ–π —Å—Ç–µ–ø–µ–Ω–∏ –æ–±—ä—è—Å–Ω—è–µ—Ç, –ø–æ—á–µ–º—É –∏–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Ç–∞–∫–æ–π –∫–æ–º–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–π –ø–æ–ª—É—á–∏–ª –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –æ—Ç–∫–ª–∏–∫–æ–≤ –∏ –ª–∞–π–∫–æ–≤.

–î–∞–≤–∞–π—Ç–µ —Ç–µ–ø–µ—Ä—å –ø–æ—Å–º–æ—Ç—Ä–∏–º –Ω–∞ —Å–∞–º—ã–π –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–π –∫–æ–º–º–µ–Ω—Ç–∞—Ä–∏–π –∏ –µ–≥–æ —Ö–∞—Ä–∞–∫—Ç–µ—Ä–∏—Å—Ç–∏–∫–∏.


## –ò—Å—Å–ª–µ–¥–æ–≤–∞–Ω–∏–µ 4 - –û–±–ª–∞–∫–æ —Å–ª–æ–≤

```{r corpus, fig.align='center', fig.height=8, fig.width=8}
# because we have relatively small number of documents we will use simple corpus
df_corpus = Corpus(VectorSource(df_comments$cmnt), readerControl = list(language = "rus"))

# load list of russian stop words
ru_stopwords <- readLines("ru_stop_words.txt", encoding = "UTF-8", skipNul = TRUE, warn = FALSE)
kz_stopwords <- readLines("kz_stop_words.txt", encoding = "UTF-8", skipNul = TRUE, warn = FALSE)

# remove contact information in the beginning of the file
ru_stopwords <- ru_stopwords[5:length(ru_stopwords)]
kz_stopwords <- kz_stopwords[5:length(kz_stopwords)]

# combine extended and standard stopwords lists
extended_stopwords <- c(stopwords('russian'), ru_stopwords, kz_stopwords)

# pre-process corpus
df_corpus <- tm_map(df_corpus, removeNumbers)
df_corpus <- tm_map(df_corpus, removePunctuation)
df_corpus <- tm_map(df_corpus, content_transformer(tolower))

# replace often misspelled significant word for correct spelling with diacritics
df_corpus <- tm_map(df_corpus, content_transformer(gsub),
                    pattern = "—É—è—Ç", replacement = "“±—è—Ç")

# remove insignificant words
words_to_remove <- c("like","wink","smile","photo","emoticon")
df_corpus <- tm_map(df_corpus, removeWords, words_to_remove)

# remove stop words and extra spaces
df_corpus <- tm_map(df_corpus, removeWords, extended_stopwords)
df_corpus <- tm_map(df_corpus, stripWhitespace)

# create term-document matrix
tdm <- TermDocumentMatrix(df_corpus)

# remove sparse words:
# 0.99999 - remain all words, nothing is deleted
# 0.9999  - remain words encountered more than 2 times
# 0.999   - remain words encountered more than 10 times
tdm <- removeSparseTerms(tdm, 0.999)

# create data frame with words sorted by frequency
d <- sort_freq(tdm)

# show top words as bar plot
par(mar = c(3,6,3,1) + 0.1)
barplot(d[1:30,]$freq,
        names.arg = d$word[1:30],
        col = "lightgreen",
        xlim = c(0,600),
        ylim = c(35,0),
        horiz = TRUE,
        las = 1)
grid(NULL, NA, lwd = 1, col = "lightgray", lty = "dotted")
title("–¢–æ–ø 30 –∏—Å–ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞–Ω–Ω—ã—Ö —Å–ª–æ–≤", adj = 0, line = 0.5)
```

```{r word_cloud, fig.height=8, fig.width=10}
# build word cloud
set.seed(2017)
wordcloud2(data = d)
```

–ú–µ—Ö–∞–Ω–∏–∑–º –æ–±–ª–∞–∫–∞ —Å–ª–æ–≤ –æ—á–µ–Ω—å –ø—Ä–æ—Å—Ç–æ–π - —á–µ–º –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ —Ä–∞–∑ –æ–ø—Ä–µ–¥–µ–ª–µ–Ω–Ω–æ–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–æ —É–ø–æ—Ç—Ä–µ–±–ª—è–ª–æ—Å—å, —Ç–µ–º –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –æ–Ω–æ –ø–æ —Ä–∞–∑–º–µ—Ä—É –Ω–∞ —ç—Ç–æ–º –æ–±–ª–∞–∫–µ. –ö–∞–∫ –º—ã –º–æ–∂–µ–º –≤–∏–¥–µ—Ç—å, —Å–∞–º–æ–µ –±–æ–ª—å—à–æ–µ —Å–ª–æ–≤–æ - —ç—Ç–æ "—Ñ–æ—Ç–æ". –ú–æ–∂–µ–º —Å–¥–µ–ª–∞—Ç—å –≤—ã–≤–æ–¥, —á—Ç–æ –ø–æ–ª—å–∑–æ–≤–∞—Ç–µ–ª–∏ –±–æ–ª—å—à–µ –≤—Å–µ–≥–æ –æ–±—Å—É–∂–¥–∞–ª–∏ –∏–º–µ–Ω–Ω–æ —Å–∞–º—É —Ñ–æ—Ç–æ–≥—Ä–∞—Ñ–∏—é, –∞ –ø–æ—Ç–æ–º —É–∂–µ –≤—Å–µ –æ—Å—Ç–∞–ª—å–Ω—ã–µ —Ç–µ–º—ã.
